titleStmt.title: A little treatise vppon the firste verse of the 122. Psalm stirring vp vnto carefull desiring a dutifull labouring for true church gouernement ... R.H.
titleStmt.author: Harrison, Robert, d. 1585?

titleStmt.title: A little treatise vppon the firste verse of the 122. Psalm stirring vp vnto carefull desiring a dutifull labouring for true church gouernement ... R.H.
titleStmt.author: Harrison, Robert, d. 1585?

notesStmt.note: R.H. = Robert Harrison. Title in part from STC as title page as filmed too dark to read. Imprint from STC.
Running title reads: A treatise vpon the first verse of the 122. Psalme.
Harrison's books were suppressed by proclamation on 30 June 1583 (see STC 8141).
Imperfect; title page as filmed too dark to read. Leaves H6 and H7 lacking.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
